cause.description:
Your generous giving makes possible the majority of the General Board’s ministries, including (but not limited to): Brethren Volunteer Service, youth and young adult programming, church planting, peace and justice activism, denominational communication services, ministries of the Brethren Service Center, and the General Secretary’s work. The Church of the Brethren touches the lives of many, both in the United States and in other countries. Thank you for your gift that enables the General Board to increase our faith family’s ability to share Christ with the world through word and deed!
Your gift will directly support a variety of General Board ministries.
To read more about the ministries supported by the Core Ministries Fund, please visit http://www.brethren.org/genbd/index.htm.
1. Serving the world
2. Living God's word
3. Connecting people
4. Resourcing the church
5. Sharing our gifts
